medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ).
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain for the past several days, initially diffuse and now localized to RLQ. The patient has been experiencing constipation the past few days not relieved by multiple bowel regimen medications. Post-prandial nausea present without vomiting. No fevers or chills. Girlfriend had gastroenteritis last week and has since recovered.
medical_history.family_history: No gastrointestinal problems or cancers in family, no inflammatory bowel disease or irritable bowel syndrome.
